class.name: AudioServer
class.brief_description: Server interface for low level audio access.
class.description: AudioServer is a low level server interface for audio access. It is in charge of creating sample data (playable audio) as well as its playback via a voice interface.

method.name: add_bus
method.description: Adds a bus at [code]at_position[/code].

method.name: add_bus_effect
method.description: Adds an [AudioEffect] effect to the bus [code]bus_idx[/code] at [code]at_position[/code].

method.name: generate_bus_layout
method.description: Generates an [AudioBusLayout] using the available busses and effects.

method.name: get_bus_count
method.description: Returns the number of available busses.

method.name: get_bus_effect
method.description: Returns the [AudioEffect] at position [code]effect_idx[/code] in bus [code]bus_idx[/code].

method.name: get_bus_effect_count
method.description: Returns the number of effects on the bus at [code]bus_idx[/code].

method.name: get_bus_index
method.description: Returns the index of the bus with the name [code]bus_name[/code].

method.name: get_bus_name
method.description: Returns the name of the bus with the index [code]bus_idx[/code].

method.name: get_bus_peak_volume_left_db
method.description: Returns the peak volume of the left speaker at bus index [code]bus_idx[/code] and channel index [code]channel[/code].

method.name: get_bus_peak_volume_right_db
method.description: Returns the peak volume of the right speaker at bus index [code]bus_idx[/code] and channel index [code]channel[/code].

method.name: get_bus_send
method.description: Returns the name of the bus that the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] sends to.

method.name: get_bus_volume_db
method.description: Returns the volume of the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] in dB.

method.name: get_mix_rate
method.description: Returns the sample rate at the output of the audioserver.

method.name: get_speaker_mode
method.description: Returns the speaker configuration.

method.name: is_bus_bypassing_effects
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is bypassing effects.

method.name: is_bus_effect_enabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the effect at index [code]effect_idx[/code] on the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is enabled.

method.name: is_bus_mute
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is muted.

method.name: is_bus_solo
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is in solo mode.

method.name: lock
method.description: Locks the audio drivers mainloop. Remember to unlock it afterwards.

method.name: move_bus
method.description: Moves the bus from index [code]index[/code] to index [code]to_index[/code].

method.name: remove_bus
method.description: Removes the bus at index [code]index[/code].

method.name: remove_bus_effect
method.description: Removes the effect at index [code]effect_idx[/code] from the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code].

method.name: set_bus_bypass_effects
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is bypassing effects.

method.name: set_bus_count
method.description: Adds and removes busses to make the number of busses match [code]amount[/code].

method.name: set_bus_effect_enabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the effect at index [code]effect_idx[/code] on the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is enabled.

method.name: set_bus_layout
method.description: Overwrites the currently used [AudioBusLayout].

method.name: set_bus_mute
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is muted.

method.name: set_bus_name
method.description: Sets the name of the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] to [code]name[/code].

method.name: set_bus_send
method.description: Connects the output of the bus at [code]bus_idx[/code] to the bus named [code]send[/code].

method.name: set_bus_solo
method.description: If [code]true[/code] the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] is in solo mode.

method.name: set_bus_volume_db
method.description: Sets the volume of the bus at index [code]bus_idx[/code] to [code]volume_db[/code].

method.name: swap_bus_effects
method.description: Swaps the position of two effects in bus [code]bus_idx[/code].

method.name: unlock
method.description: Unlocks the audiodriver's main loop. After locking it always unlock it.

constants.constant: Two or fewer speakers are detected.
